title: 1.8原版命令方块制作喷气背包
author: MoKuai_Modular
txt_content:
本帖最后由 MoKuai_Modular 于 2016-2-18 15:21 编辑 

1.8的命令方块功能很强大 但是相比较1.9的功能还是弱了一点

1.9有一个特殊生物 长得像贝壳 攻击方式就是让玩家飞起来 然后掉下来摔死  国外的大大就根据这个原理制作了一个喷气背包
但是我们也可以利用1.8来制作一个喷气背包{:10_492:}




好的上图




是的你没有看错 我们在1.8原版生存情况下飞起来了
{:10_509:}{:10_509:}{:10_509:}

那么你会问 怎么飞起来的呢
首先  /give @p command_block
蓝后把下面的代码粘贴到命令方块里面




/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~ ~ ~1 ~ ~-24 ~1 redstone_block},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~ ~2 ~ ~ ~-25 ~1 air},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~3 ~-7 ~ {Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~ ~ ~-1 ~6 ~ ~1 quartz_block}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/scoreboard objectives add zh dummy},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~4 ~-15 ~-1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/execute @a[score_zh_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /effect @p 11 3 100},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/execute @a[score_zh_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /summon Fireball ~ ~-1 ~ {direction:[0.0,1.0,0.0],ExplosionPower:1}},Time:1,}}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~5 ~-14 ~-1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/scoreboard players set @a[score_hys_min=1,score_zh_min=1] zh 0},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/scoreboard players set @a[score_hys_min=1] zh 1 {SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:gunpowder"}}},Time:1,}}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~6 ~-13 ~-1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/execute @a[score_zh_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /summon Fireball ~ ~-1 ~ {direction:[0.0,1.0,0.0],ExplosionPower:1}},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~7 ~-12 ~-1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/execute @e[type=Fireball,score_Fire_min=7] ~ ~ ~ /effect @e[r=5] minecraft:wither 10 3 true},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~8 ~-11 ~-1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:2333333333333333},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~9 ~-10 ~-1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/scoreboard players set @a[score_time_min=30] time 0},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~4 ~-10 ~1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/scoreboard players add @a[score_zh_min=1] time 1},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/clear @a[score_time_min=30] minecraft:gunpowder 0 1},Time:1,}}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~5 ~-9 ~1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/scoreboard objectives add time dummy},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~6 ~-8 ~1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/scoreboard players set @p hys 1},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~7 ~-7 ~1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/scoreboard players set @a[score_hys_min=1] zh 1 {SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:gunpowder"}}},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~8 ~-6 ~1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/gamerule mobGriefing false},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~9 ~-5 ~1 {Block:quartz_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/scoreboard objectives add hys dummy},Time:1,}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:gamerule commandBlockOutput false},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~3 ~-6 ~ ~9 ~-5 ~ redstone_block},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~3 ~-5 ~-1 command_block 0 replace {Command:fill ~ ~ ~1 ~6 ~1 ~1 stone 0 replace redstone_block}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~3 ~-4 ~1 command_block 0 replace {Command:fill ~ ~ ~-1 ~6 ~1 ~-1 redstone_block 0 replace stone}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~1 ~-2 ~ wall_sign 4 replace {Text1:"{text:'喷气背包',clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\"/give @p minecraft:diamond_chestplate 1 0 {ench:[{id:34,lvl:9999}],display:{color:255}}\"},bold:true,color:red}",Text2:"{text:'作者MoKuai_Modular',bold:true,color:blue}",Text3:"{text:'右键获得喷气背包',bold:true,color:gold}",Text4:"{text:'',color:black}"}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~1 ~-2 ~ wall_sign 4 replace {Text1:"{text:'',clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\"/fill ~ ~-1 ~-2 ~9 ~3 ~2 air 0 replace\"},color:black}",Text2:"{text:'右键移除系统',color:red}",Text3:"{text:'',color:black}",Text4:"{text:'',color:black}"}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~2 ~-1 ~-2 ~10 ~0 ~2 glass 0 replace quartz_block},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~3 ~ ~-1 ~9 ~4 ~1 air 0 replace quartz_block},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~2 ~ ~-2 ~10 ~3 ~2 quartz_block},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:stone,Time:1}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码





用红石方块驱动一下


右键一下木牌 给你一个胸甲 然并卵
拿一组的火药
把他拿在手上

在跳一下 是的你飞了















是的聪明的你已经猜到了原理     当你拿着火药时会在脚下生成火球 给你抗性提升100 保证炸不死你
然后用记分板计时 3秒清除一个火药


好的该说的已经说完不会的自己开个存档试试


奥 对了  祝大家新年快乐

replies.txt_content: 我想说 MCBBS的搜索引擎真恶心

2，我已经预测到飞完以后掉下来要点重生了
